page.title: 06Education: Cranshaws School
page.content:
Cranshaws School provides education for children between the ages of 5 and 12 years in the Upper Whiteadder area.
Educational Objectives are: to provide a secure, pleasant and appropriately equippped environment within which each child may develop to his full capacity so that he may enjoy a satisfactory life as an adult and will take his place in society able to make a worthwhile contribution to the life and work of the community
to follow a balanced, comprehensive curriculum assisting development of an appreciation of the uniqueness of the individual, an awareness of other people, the importance of, and qualities needed for, good relation- ships, encourage the individual quest for truth and value in life ...cont
